alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 7:55AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Paint River at Crystal Falls (Paint) affecting Iron County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... South Branch Ontonagon near Ewen affecting Ontonagon County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...South Branch Ontonagon near Ewen. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, The lumber yard near the M-28 bridge in Ewen begins to flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:55 AM EDT Friday the stage was 33.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:55 AM EDT Friday was 33.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 33.9 feet on 04/30/2013. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by this evening at 1000 PM CDT /1100 PM EDT/.
